body:
*You are an insidious POV ``editor`` - I use quotation marks as personally I consider you very far from a competent content editor. Get a live, learn some integrity and as far as I'm concerned move on. You are not worth the dirt on my shoes ... take a hike ... do I need to make my thoughts about you any clearer?

Researcher’s note: POV is an acronym for Point Of View

Researcher’s note: IP is an acronym for Internet Protocol, and is the internet equivalent of a telephone number for your computer. NPOV is an acronym for Neutral Point Of View.

Researcher’s note: DDOS is an acronym for Distributed Denial Of Service, and is a method usually used for attacking websites - having so many fake users access a website/resource that the website/resource goes down.
